summary.para: The HTTP_BANDWIDTH_LIMIT_INFO structure is used to set or query the bandwidth throttling limit.
This structure must be used when setting or querying the on a URL Group or server session.

member.name: HTTP_BANDWIDTH_LIMIT_INFO.Flags
member.summary: The structure specifying whether the property is present.

member.name: HTTP_BANDWIDTH_LIMIT_INFO.MaxBandwidth
member.summary: The maximum allowed bandwidth rate in bytesper second. Setting the value to HTTP_LIMIT_INFINITE allows unlimited bandwidth rate. The value cannot be smaller than HTTP_MIN_ALLOWED_BANDWIDTH_THROTTLING_RATE.
